name: Primates together strong
description:
A 2d puzzle platformer, where you control a gorilla and a monkey that have to work together to beat each level.

It's played on pc in the browser, and you can read about the controls in the game. Remember to make it full-screen. You could also play a 2 player mode, by having 2 people use the same keyboard.

Credits:

Olivia Nobre Hauptmann: gorilla drawing.

Isabella Nobre Hauptmann: monkey drawing.

Ib Nobre Hauptmann: other visuals, game design, programming, music and other audio.

The images used for the background are ones that I found on google under creative comoms licenses, which I blurred, desaturated, and lightened.
